body: Well i have not done an AMA since MCzone sooo lets get started. For those of you who don't know AMA stands for ask me anything so no prizes for guessing what to do, but yeah fire away. :)
body_tagged: Well i have not done an AMA since MCzone sooo lets get started. For those of you who don't know AMA stands for ask me anything so no prizes for guessing what to do, but yeah fire away. :)
title: bmbrocks321's AMA

replies.body: Hey bmb, I always ask this question. Lol. Sex with a donkey or sex with a horse and why?
replies.body_tagged: Hey bmb, I always ask this question. Lol. Sex with a donkey or sex with a horse and why?

replies.body: Why this name?
replies.body_tagged: Why this name?

replies.body: Demonic Mushroom or a Mushroomic Demon?
replies.body_tagged: Demonic Mushroom or a Mushroomic Demon?

replies.body:
Sniper, umm what a weird question but a horse i guess, it is a more magestic animal. 

Calined bmb are my initials: Barney, Michael, Bannister (#DifferentnameFTW).

Fazer a demonic mushroom sounds terrifying but cool at the same time so i will go with that ;D.
replies.body_tagged:
Sniper, umm what a weird question but a horse i guess, it is a more magestic animal.

Fazer a demonic mushroom sounds terrifying but cool at the same time so i will go with that ;D.

Just curious :3
Don't see many questions like these eh?

replies.body: Favourite basketballer?
replies.body_tagged: Favourite basketballer?

replies.body:
Fish, it depends on what mood i am in. 

Fazer i am quite big on fitness so here are my results. 
Pushups: 18 
Pull Ups: 7 
12 min run: 2800m  
I am 13, year 8.
Chris Paul, because he is an underdog being 5,10 yet he can still dunk and his skills are insane!

Fish, it depends on what mood i am in.

12 min run: 2800m  
I am 13, year 8.
Chris Paul, because he is an underdog being 5,10 yet he can still dunk and his skills are insane!

replies.body:
My god dat cooper tho
I get like 2400m But i have top scores on pullups and pushups
I get 23 underhand pullups (chinups, dunno bout normal pullups)
and last time i tried 30 sec pushups i got 31 but i probably can do more now

replies.body: How old?

replies.body: 14, going to year 9 after summerbreak.
replies.body_tagged: 14, going to year 9 after summerbreak.

replies.body: Did u won that match u where talking about?
replies.body_tagged: Did u won that match u where talking about?

replies.body:
Fazer.... If you are 14 then you would be going to year 10 after summer. I suppose it depends on where you live.

Half and half belguim, we won the match but i didn't get selected for the State/County team.
